title: Bug 114470: Error message appears when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter.
description: When attempting to use the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
EB: No error message should be displayed when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter.
SR:
1. Create a datasource and a dataset that contain a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the 'value' field of the filter, input new Date('3/2/2005').
